Description: Large fragment of a shroud mainly of undyed linen. Large scale Arabic inscription, tapestry woven on cherry-red silk - high letters c. 7cm, tops of letters decorated. Towards right of fragment, vertical seam joins the two selvedges, the other end of the cloth folded back on itself. Hem across the bottom of the fragment, on the left with a band of red silk.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
